original_text: But neither he nor his servants nor the people of the land listened to the words of the Lord that he spoke through Jeremiah the prophet.
korean_text: 그와 그의 신하와 그의 땅 백성이 여호와께서 선지자 예레미야에게 하신 말씀을 듣지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: But neither he nor his servants
nor the people of the land
listened to the words of the Lord
that he spoke through Jeremiah the prophet.
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 예레미야 선지자를 통해 말씀하신 것을
